gold.user: User wants to create a new checklist for a specific board in Trello.
gold.ideal: The checklist is successfully created and returns the checklist ID.

gold.user: User wants to delete a checklist that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: The checklist is deleted successfully, and a confirmation message is returned.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific checklist to review its contents.
gold.ideal: The checklist details are returned, including its name and items.

gold.user: User wants to update the checklist name to reflect its current purpose.
gold.ideal: The checklist is updated successfully, and the new name is returned.

gold.user: User wants to find out which board a specific checklist belongs to.
gold.ideal: The board details associated with the checklist are returned.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a specific field of the board associated with a checklist.
gold.ideal: The requested field data of the board is returned.

gold.user: User wants to see all cards associated with a specific checklist.
gold.ideal: A list of cards linked to the checklist is returned.

gold.user: User wants to filter cards in a checklist based on a specific criterion.
gold.ideal: Filtered cards based on the specified criterion are returned.

gold.user: User wants to view all check items within a checklist.
gold.ideal: A list of check items in the checklist is returned.

gold.user: User wants to add a new check item to a checklist.
gold.ideal: The new check item is added successfully, and its details are returned.

gold.user: User wants to remove a specific check item from a checklist.
gold.ideal: The check item is deleted successfully, and a confirmation message is returned.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific check item.
gold.ideal: The details of the requested check item are returned.

gold.user: User wants to associate a checklist with a specific card.
gold.ideal: The checklist is successfully linked to the card, and confirmation is returned.

gold.user: User wants to change the name of a checklist to better describe its purpose.
gold.ideal: The checklist name is updated successfully, and the new name is returned.

gold.user: User wants to change the position of a checklist within a board.
gold.ideal: The position of the checklist is updated successfully.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a specific field of a checklist.
gold.ideal: The requested field data of the checklist is returned.
